[[File:Adult teeth.png|neant|thumbnail]]

question.title: What is the primary purpose of the International Numbering System in dentistry?

option_a.title: To classify teeth based on their location in the mouth

option_b.title: To determine the age of a patient based on their teeth

option_c.title: To identify the type of dental anomaly or defect

option_d.title: To standardize the numbering of teeth for orthodontic treatment

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
